listitem.para: Sets the pen color to color, which can either be a color index or a color vector. A color index is a number from 0 - 15. A color vector is a list of [red green blue] intensities, each in the range of 0 - 255. For an explanation of the color input, see the section on Using Color.
The pen color affects any line drawn by the turtle (such as FORWARD). It also affects text that is drawn with LABEL.

programlisting.userinput: REPEAT 255 [ SETPENCOLOR (LIST REPCOUNT 0 0) FORWARD 100 BACK 100 RIGHT 1 ]
; using variables in a color vector MAKE "red 100 MAKE "green 100 MAKE "blue 100 SETPENCOLOR [:red :green :blue] ; error SETPENCOLOR (LIST :red :green :blue) ; works
